collisionSystem¶

class collisionSystem.CollisionSystem(event_manager, world)[source]¶

Moves object, checks collision, sends events for collision handling and updates image position of moved objects.

Implementation is inspired by the Pygame Platformer Examples.

Attributes:
  • event_manager (events.EventManager): event manager
  • world (gameWorld.GameWorld): game world contains entities
  • gravity (2D list): direction of this vector is gravity direction and length of this vector is the strength of gravity. Default is (0, 0.4)
calculate_collision_x(collider_ID, collidee_IDs_list)[source]¶

Move collider in x direction and check collision between collider and all other collidees.

Parameters:
  • collider_ID (int) – collider id
  • collidee_IDs_list (list (int)) – list that contains ids of all objects, with which a collision can occur
calculate_collision_y(colliderID, collideeIDsList)[source]¶

Move collider in y direction and check collision between collider and all other collidees.

Parameters:
  • colliderID (int) – collider id
  • collideeIDsList (list (int)) – list that contains ids of all objects, with which a collision can occur
